data.event: The railroad went through that region in 1907, and a new church was built north of the tracks in 1908.

event.title: was built north of the tracks in 1908

data.event: The railroad went through that region in 1907, and a new church was built north of the tracks in 1908.
Roy post office was established in 1907 and named for the Roy family, who were local pioneers.
In 1908, a Catholic school called St. Ferdinand's opened in the local church.
A standalone wood-framed school opened in September 1912, which was renamed as St. Francis of Assisi Catholic School in 1920.

event.title: was renamed as St. Francis of Assisi

data.event: A standalone wood-framed school opened in September 1912, which was renamed as St. Francis of Assisi Catholic School in 1920.
